name: Shark Simulator
description: Shark Simulator is a WTF physics sandbox. Play as Ed the shark, and give those tourists a vacation they will remember!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11-ompatible, 16-bit
